date.value: (str) The date on which the solution was obtained/made public in format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

publication.value: (str) The DOI linking to the publication. This will be shown in the summary table.
publication.title: (str) A title of any publication that may be associated to the solution.

hardware.maximum number of qubits: (int) The maximum number of qubits used in a single quantum circuit.
hardware.name: Name of the hardware that run the computation.

objective.value: (float or int) The value of the objective function that the solution achieved.
objective.unit: (str) The unit in which the quality is measured.
objective.description: (str) A description of how quality is measured.
objective.metadata: A free form dictionary to include additional metrics and information.

approximation ratio.value: (float) The value of the objective function that the solution achieved.
approximation ratio.unit: (str) The unit in which the quality is measured.
approximation ratio.description: (str) A description of how quality is measured.
approximation ratio.metadata: A free form dictionary to include additional metrics and information.

time to solution.value: (float) The time it took to find the solution.
time to solution.unit: (str) The unit in which the time-to-solution is given. This should ideally be 's' to indicate seconds.
time to solution.description: (str) A description of how time to solution is measured.
time to solution.metadata: A free form dictionary to include additional metrics and information.

cost of solution.value: A float which gives the cost of the solution.
cost of solution.unit: A string of the unit in which the cost-of-solution is given.
cost of solution.description: A description of how cost-of-solution is measured.
cost of solution.metadata: A free form dictionary to include additional metrics and information.
